content: CAR 08 MR-Section 3.3: In the metering diagram the following | mistakes were found: . However as per actual site condition, there is no energy meters installed at DP yard. The diagrams in the section 3.3 of the | revised MR have been changed to | include the correct location of WTGs and metering points. The mistakes in the metering diagram are now rectified. CAR-08 is closed CAR 09 MR-Section 4.1: e Baseline emission calculation is not provided Units for the generations The baseline emission calculations | have been included in the section 4.1 of the revised MR along with units for e Baseline emission calculation is now provided in the section 4.1 of MR
